############
Installation
############

Requirements
**********************

* PHP 5.6, PHP 7
* Nginx
* Cassandra 2.2 or greater
* RabbitMQ
* OpenSSL

*optional*

* MongoDB *(for boost)*
* Neo4j 2.2 or greater *(for discovery)*
* Redis *(for pubsub, live and caching)*


Configuration
**********************

.. code-block:: bash

  php bin/cli.php install


Troubleshooting
**********************

* foobar
